meanings.sent1: The painting looked splotchier after the kids added their fingerprints.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was splotchier than his, with colorful stains all over.
meanings.sent3: The splotchier the cake icing, the more artistic it seemed.
meanings.sent4: The splotchier the sky, the more beautiful the sunset appeared.
meanings.sent5: The splotchier the map, the harder it was to read the directions.

meanings.definition: Having more splotches than something else.
meanings.sent1: The leopard was splotchier than the cheetah, with a pattern of spots all over.
meanings.sent2: His notebook was splotchier than hers, filled with ink blots on every page.
meanings.sent3: The splotchier the garden, the more colorful and vibrant it looked.
meanings.sent4: The splotchier the music, the more dynamic and textured the sound became.
meanings.sent5: The splotchier the fabric, the more unique and interesting the design appeared.
